page.title: 20Filey's Town Crier.
page.content: During the Filey Festival Week the town can boast it's very own Town Crier.Mr.George Hains,a retired army major who moved here two years ago,this year had the job.The crier goes round the various events and welcomes and thanks the participants. {||||||||||||||||||||||||} This survey has been written by various members of Form Five,Filey Junior School with the help of the teachers in the school.The following children actually fed the data into the computer:-Andrew Barden,Gary Hall, David Neilson,Deborah Whitaker,Susie Johnson,Jennifer Chambers,Richard Adams,Claire Little and Emma Willis. {***************************** {
